snippet.title: StrangerZ Official Teaser Trailer - FREE TO PLAY
snippet.description:
StrangerZ is a Free to Play Multiplayer Survival Horror game. Play as or survive against the "Stranger" with your teammates until dawn. Level up your stats and rank by either surviving or killing all players.

+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=
WISHLIST NOW: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2293600/StrangerZ
+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=
Join Discord Community: https://discord.gg/GXUpHvxmKu
+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=

Gameplay:
Group up with friends or other players in this fun immersive horror game. Select your lobby size ranging from 1v1 to 4v1. One player from your lobby will randomly be selected at the start of a game to play as the Stranger. The other player(s) will be "Survivors" and have to defend the house from 12am to 6am. The game ends once the "Stranger" gets past the "Survivors" defenses and kills them or if the "Survivors" survive until 6am. Every time you win a game you will earn money that you can spend upgrading your stats for things such as stamina and speed or cosmetics.

"Survivor" Gameplay:
Survivors will be have to work together to defend their home from the Stranger. Each player will be equipped with a lock that can be placed on the windows and picked up. You must use your equipment such as flood lights, sensors and more to find where the Stranger is attacking and lock that window before its to late. If you successfully lock the window in time don't rest for long because the Stranger will come from a new direction. You must survive until 6am.

"Stranger" Gameplay:
At the beginning of each round a player from the lobby will be selected to play the Stranger. Your goal is to break into the house and kill all of the Survivors. The Stranger picks a window at the start of every "attack" and will have to weave through the yard of the house and try to reach the window undetected. Different sabotage abilities such as cutting power to the house, are at the Strangers disposable but must be used wisely.

Progression/Player Upgrades:
(Still under development, the following is a preview of what Progression/Player Upgrades may look like)
Earn cash after winning as either the Stranger or Survivor and using the cash to upgrade your stats to improve movement speed, gain new equipment, and much more.

Ranking/Competition:
(Still under development, the following is a preview of what Ranking/Competition may look like)
By winning/loosing games you will gain/loose RP (rank points), your RP will determine the skill level of other players you play and determine your rank which resets every season. More info coming soon.

Immersive Graphics/Atmosphere:
Realistic graphics and spatial audio will have you on your toes and your computer running well with the new UNREAL ENGINE 5 next-gen engine giving you peak quality with little performance risk.

Cosmetics:
Information Coming Soon! TBA

#trailer #gametrailers #multiplayer
